metadata.title: Latigerf Always daddy's princess Sterling Silver Heart Engraved Pendant Necklace CZ Birthday Gift Women
features: Engraved text"Always daddy's princess". Heart necklace is a classic symbol of love. This gorgeous 925 Sterling Silver heart Necklace has elegant heart shaped which symbolizes eternity of love. A sparking round-shaped Cubic Zirconia diamond standing in the heart center.

The love heart silver necklace made from premium quality gold platinum plated 925 sterling silver. 18-inch 925 sterling silver cable chain with spring ring clasp for secure closure. Diamonds and silver twisted as a heart-shaped pendant. A high quality round cut cubic zirconia diamond has been cleverly and perfectly set on the center of the heart pendant. cutout bottom design results in more sparkle by reflecting more lights.

The exquisite sterling silver necklace comes in a pretty gift box. Perfect as a simple romantic gesture, suits for all age group.
